<!DOCTYPE html><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"      prefix="og: http://opengraphprotocol.org/schema/ fb: http://www.facebook.com/2010/fbml d: http://dictionary.com/2011/dml">    <head>        <meta http-equiv="Content-type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />        <base href="http://www.dictionary.com/">        <title>Industry | Define Industry at Dictionary.com</title>        <script type="text/javascript">    var cookiesManager = function (){        'use strict';        var persistentValues = [];        return {            getCookieValue : function(name) {                var value = null,                    cookies = document.cookie,                    searchedCookie = cookies.indexOf(" " + name + "=");                // it's worth to check, if cookie is not first cookie                if (searchedCookie === -1) {                    var checkFirstCookie = cookies.indexOf(name + "=");                    searchedCookie = checkFirstCookie == 0 ? 0 : -1;                }                if (searchedCookie > -1) {                    var startPositionOfValue = cookies.indexOf("=", searchedCookie) + 1,                        endPositionOfValue = cookies.indexOf(";", searchedCookie);                    if (endPositionOfValue === -1) {                        endPositionOfValue = searchedCookie.length;                    }                    value = cookies.substring(startPositionOfValue,endPositionOfValue);                }                return value;            },            setCookie: function(name, value, hours, domain) {                var expires = '',                    domain  = domain || UrlHelper.getCurrentDomain();                if(hours !== undefined) {                    var now     = new Date(),                        time    = now.getTime();                    time += (3600 * hours) * 1000;                    now.setTime(time);                    expires = ';expires=' + now.toGMTString();                }                document.cookie =                    name + '=' + value +                        expires +                        ';path=/' +                        ';domain=' + domain;            },            /*            * This method ensures, that everywhere on the page value of cookie will be the same.            * It's important in case of cookie, which value can change across the page.            */            getPersistentCookieValue: function(name) {                if (typeof persistentValues[name] === 'undefined') {                    persistentValues[name] = this.getCookieValue(name);                    // after reading value, cookie has to be removed                    this.setCookie(name, null, -1);                }                return persistentValues[name];            }        }    }();</script><script type="text/javascript">    /*jslint browser: true */    var UrlHelper = function() {        var COOKIE_DOMAIN_THESAURUS     = '.thesaurus.com';        var COOKIE_DOMAIN_DICTIONARY    = '.dictionary.com';        var COOKIE_DOMAIN_REFERENCE     = '.reference.com';        var domain = null;        var currentURL = null;        var spanidsUrl = null;        function getSpanidsUrl(bid, sid, currentDomain) {            var url     = 'http://';            var source  = '';            if(currentDomain == COOKIE_DOMAIN_DICTIONARY) {                url += 'spanids.reference.com/?';                source = 'd';            } else if (currentDomain == COOKIE_DOMAIN_REFERENCE){                url += 'spanids.dictionary.com/?';                source = 'r';            } else {                url += 'spanids.dictionary.com/?';                source = 't';            }            url += 'bid=' + bid + '&asid=' + sid + '&bidnew=1&asidnew=1&source=' + source + '&site=app';            return url;        }        function getCurrentDomain() {            var host = window.location.host;            var value = "";            if(host.indexOf(COOKIE_DOMAIN_THESAURUS) > -1) {                value = COOKIE_DOMAIN_THESAURUS;            } else if(host.indexOf(COOKIE_DOMAIN_DICTIONARY) > -1) {                value = COOKIE_DOMAIN_DICTIONARY;            } else if(host.indexOf(COOKIE_DOMAIN_REFERENCE) > -1){                value = COOKIE_DOMAIN_REFERENCE;            }            return value;        }        return {            getCurrentDomain : function() {                if(domain === null) {                    domain = getCurrentDomain();                }                return domain;            },            getCurrentDomainFromRequest : function() {                return window.location.host;            },            getCurrentUrl : function() {                if(currentURL === null) {                    currentURL = window.location.protocol + "//" + window.location.host + "" + window.location.pathname;                }                return currentURL;            },            getSpanidsUrl : function(bid, sid, domain) {                if(spanidsUrl === null) {                    spanidsUrl = getSpanidsUrl(bid, sid, domain);                }                return spanidsUrl;            }        }    }();</script><script type="text/javascript">    var BidSidGenerator = (function () {        'use strict';        var COOKIE_NAME_BID = 'bid',            COOKIE_NAME_SID = 'sid',            COOKIE_NAME_SPANIDS = 'spanids',            COOKIE_BID_EXPIRES = 17520, //two years            COOKIE_SID_EXPIRES = 0.5, //half an hour            bidCookieValue = null,            sidCookieValue = null,            bidCookieCreated = false,            sidCookieCreated = false,            spanIdsCookiePresent = false;        // generates value of bid/sid cookie        function generateCookieValue() {            var max = 999999,                min = 100000,                rand = Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min)) + min,                time = new Date().getTime();            return rand + "-" + time;        }        // sets value of spanIdsCookiePresent attribute to true and delete spanids cookie,        // if cookie exist and have appropriate value        function processSpanIdsCookie() {            var spanIdsValue = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_SPANIDS);            if(spanIdsValue === '1') {                cookiesManager.setCookie(COOKIE_NAME_SPANIDS, 0, -1); //removes spanids cookie                spanIdsCookiePresent = true;            }            return false;        }        return {            init: function () {                bidCookieValue  = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_BID);                sidCookieValue  = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_SID);                if (bidCookieValue == null || bidCookieValue.length == 0) {                    bidCookieValue = generateCookieValue();                    cookiesManager.setCookie(COOKIE_NAME_BID, bidCookieValue, COOKIE_BID_EXPIRES);                    bidCookieCreated = true;                }                if (sidCookieValue == null || sidCookieValue.length == 0) {                    sidCookieValue = generateCookieValue();                    sidCookieCreated = true;                }                processSpanIdsCookie();                cookiesManager.setCookie(COOKIE_NAME_SID, sidCookieValue, COOKIE_SID_EXPIRES);            },            propagateCookies: function() {                if (bidCookieCreated || sidCookieCreated || spanIdsCookiePresent) {                    var url = UrlHelper.getSpanidsUrl(bidCookieValue, sidCookieValue, UrlHelper.getCurrentDomain()),                        iFrame = '<iframe id="spanids" style="width:1px;height:1px;margin-left:-1;position:absolute;border:none;" src="' + url + '"></iframe>';                    document.write(iFrame);                }            },            touchSidCookie: function () {                sidCookieValue  = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_SID);                if (sidCookieValue == null || sidCookieValue.length == 0) {                    sidCookieValue = generateCookieValue();                    sidCookieCreated = true;                }                cookiesManager.setCookie(COOKIE_NAME_SID, sidCookieValue, COOKIE_SID_EXPIRES);            },            isSidCookieCreated: function () {                return sidCookieCreated;            },            isSpanIdsCookiePresent: function () {                return spanIdsCookiePresent;            }        };    }());    BidSidGenerator.init();    BidSidGenerator.propagateCookies();</script><script type="text/javascript">    /*    This partial is used only on DCOM SERP. It's responsible for read "searchOrgQuery" cookie, which is set during redirection    for Index Divorce project and only then. After read this cookie, cookie is deleted, but value is still accessible via SOQR api.     */    var DARCI = DARCI || {};    DARCI.OQR = (function(){        'use strict';        var COOKIE_NAME = 'OriginalQuery',            value = -1;        function setValue() {            value = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME);            if (value !== null) {                value = decodeURIComponent(value);            }        }        function deleteCookie() {            cookiesManager.setCookie(COOKIE_NAME, null, -1);        }        function init() {            setValue();            deleteCookie();        }        return {            getValue: function() {                if (value === -1) {                    init();                }                return value;            }        }    })();</script><script>    var DARCI = DARCI || {},        u = "http://track.dictionary.com/main.gif?ev=ps&qr=%25%25QUERY%25%25&rf_qr=%25%25REFQUERY%25%25&pn=dic&st=dict&ab=&dc=desktop",        s = location.search.match(new RegExp('[\?\&]s=([^\&]*)(\&?)', 'i')),        ms = (typeof ms === 'undefined') ? cookiesManager.getCookieValue('mseg') || "" : ms,        /**         * Because this file is added only in case when CSL is enabled,         * we can be sure cookieManager will be available.         */        refQuery = cookiesManager.getPersistentCookieValue('ReferrerQuery'),        query, orgQuery;    DARCI.SearchBoxClickLinkId = '59wn52';            orgQuery = typeof DARCI.OQR !== 'undefined' ? DARCI.OQR.getValue() : null;        query =  orgQuery !== null ? orgQuery : "industry";        u = u.replace('%25%25QUERY%25%25', query);        if (s != null && s[1]) {        if (s[1] == 't' || s[1] == 'ts' || s[1] == 'tn') {            var ev = u.indexOf('ev=');            if (ev !== -1) {                ev = ev + 3;                u = u.slice(0, ev) + 'c' + u.slice(ev) + '&cl=59wn52&sc=1';                u = u.replace('%25%25REFQUERY%25%25', refQuery);            }        }    }    new Image().src = u + "&ms=" + ms + "&rf=" + encodeURIComponent(document.referrer) + "&cb=" + Math.floor((Math.random() * 899999999) + 100000000);</script><link rel="dns-prefetch" href="//static.sfdict.com" /><link rel="dns-prefetch" href="//pixel.quantserve.com" /><link rel="dns-prefetch" href="//partner.googleadservices.com" /><link rel="dns-prefetch" href="//pubads.g.doubleclick.net" /><link rel="dns-prefetch" href="//pagead2.googlesyndication.com" /><link rel="dns-prefetch" href="//pr.ybp.yahoo.com" /><link rel="dns-prefetch" href="//ads.yahoo.com" /><link rel="dns-prefetch" href="//u.openx.net" /><link rel="dns-prefetch" href="//ib.adnxs.com" /><link rel="dns-prefetch" href="//ox-d.bstk.servedbyopenx.com" /><link rel="dns-prefetch" href="https://ad.doubleclick.net" /><script>    /**     * The module is responsible for setting/incrementing the value of sc cookie which contains "sessionCount,pageviewCount" values.     *     * init: sets the cookie with default values or increments; actions performed are based on condition whether the     *          sid cookie was created or already existed. The default expiration time for sc cookie is 0.5 year     *     * global BidSidGenerator     * global cookiesManager     * global UrlHelper     */    var SCCookie = function () {        var COOKIE_NAME_SC = "sc",            DELIMITER = ",",            sessionCountValue = 0,            pageviewCountValue  = 0,            cookieExpiration  = 180 * 24; // half a year        /**         * Reads "sc" cookie and parses the value into appropriate variables.         * @returns {boolean} Was the cookie present?         */        function readCookie()        {            var cookieValue = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_SC),                cookieValuesArray,                cookieSessionCountValue,                cookiePageviewCountValue;            if (cookieValue == null) {                return false;            }            cookieValuesArray = cookieValue.split(DELIMITER);            cookieSessionCountValue = parseInt(cookieValuesArray[0], 10);            cookiePageviewCountValue = parseInt(cookieValuesArray[1], 10);            if (cookieSessionCountValue > 0) {                sessionCountValue = cookieSessionCountValue;            }            if (cookiePageviewCountValue > 0) {                pageviewCountValue = cookiePageviewCountValue;            }            return true;        }        /**         * Writes current variable values into the "sc" cookie.         */        function writeCookie()        {            cookiesManager.setCookie(COOKIE_NAME_SC, sessionCountValue + DELIMITER + pageviewCountValue, cookieExpiration, UrlHelper.getCurrentDomainFromRequest());        }        return {            init: function () {                if (typeof BidSidGenerator !== 'undefined') {                    var cookiePresent = readCookie();                    if (!cookiePresent) {                        sessionCountValue = 1;                        pageviewCountValue = 1;                    } else {                        if (BidSidGenerator.isSidCookieCreated() || BidSidGenerator.isSpanIdsCookiePresent()) {                            pageviewCountValue = 1;                            sessionCountValue++;                        } else {                            pageviewCountValue++;                        }                    }                    writeCookie();                }            },            getPageViewCount: function () {                return pageviewCountValue;            },            getSessionCount: function () {                return sessionCountValue;            }        }    }();    SCCookie.init();</script><script type="text/javascript">    var src = null;                        var retina = window.devicePixelRatio > 1;            if(retina) {                new Image().src = 'http://www.dictionary.com/drc/img/responsive/serp-highdpi-3146e.png';            } else {                new Image().src = 'http://www.dictionary.com/drc/img/responsive/serp-lowdpi-6c95e.png';            }            </script><meta property="fb:admins" content="100000304287730;109125464873" /><meta property="og:site_name" content="Dictionary.com" /><meta property="og:image" content="http://static.sfdict.com/dcom/img/social_logo-b8e2f.png" /><meta property="fb:app_id" content="127444090629600" /><meta name="msvalidate.01" content="DF5542D7723770377E9ABFF59AC1DC97" /><meta http-equiv="imagetoolbar" content="no" /><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, user-scalable=no" /><meta name="keywords" content="industry, online dictionary, English dictionary, industry definition, define industry, definition of industry,        industry pronunciation, industry meaning, industry origin, industry examples" /><meta property="og:title" content="the definition of industry" /><meta name="description" content="Industry definition, the aggregate of manufacturing or technically productive enterprises in a particular field, often named after its principal product: the automobile industry; the steel industry. See more." /><meta property="og:url" content="http://www.dictionary.com/browse/industry" /><link rel="shortcut icon" href="http://static.sfdict.com/dcom/favicon.ico" /><link rel="search" type="application/opensearchdescription+xml" href="http://www.dictionary.com/opensearch_desc.xml" title="Dictionary.com" /><link rel="publisher" href="https://plus.google.com/117428481782081853923" /><link rel="canonical" href="http://www.dictionary.com/browse/industry" /><link rel="stylesheet" href="http://www.dictionary.com/drc/css/combinedSerp-70e44.css" type="text/css" media="all" /><script type="text/javascript">    var searchURL = "http://www.dictionary.com/browse/%40%40queryText%40%40?s=t";var pageName = "dic";</script><script type="text/javascript">    var UserController = function() {        var USER_STATUS_LOGGED_IN = 'L';        var USER_STATUS_NOT_LOGGED = 'N';        var USER_UNDER_13 = 'Y';        var USER_OVER_13 = 'N';        var COOKIE_NAME_SESS = 'sess';        var COOKIE_NAME_FAV = 'fav';        var COOKIE_NAME_SUPERSESS = 'ss';        var PREMIUM_STATUS_VALUE = 9;        var FAV_COOKIE_PREMIUM_STATUS_KEY = 0;        var FAV_COOKIE_FAV_COUNT_KEY = 1;        var FAV_COOKIE_USER_UNDER_13_KEY = 2;        var isLoggedIn = null;        var isPremium = null;        var isSuperSess = null;        var favNumber = null;        var isUnder13 = null;        var displayAds = null;        /**         * Checking if user is under 13 using value from fav cookie         * @returns {boolean}         */        function checkIsUserUnder13() {            if (isLoggedIn !== true) {                return false;            }            var isUnder13 = USER_OVER_13;            var favCookieValue = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_FAV);            if(favCookieValue != null) {                favCookieValue = decodeURIComponent(favCookieValue);                isUnder13 = favCookieValue.split('|')[FAV_COOKIE_USER_UNDER_13_KEY];            }            return isUnder13 === USER_UNDER_13;        }        function checkIsUserLoggedIn() {            var userStatus = USER_STATUS_NOT_LOGGED;            var sessCookieValue = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_SESS);            if(sessCookieValue != null) {                userStatus = sessCookieValue.charAt(0);            }            return userStatus === USER_STATUS_LOGGED_IN;        }        function checkIfUserIsPremium() {            var premiumStatus = null;            var favCookieValue = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_FAV);            if(favCookieValue != null) {                favCookieValue = decodeURIComponent(favCookieValue);                premiumStatus = favCookieValue.split('|')[FAV_COOKIE_PREMIUM_STATUS_KEY];            }            return premiumStatus == PREMIUM_STATUS_VALUE;        }        function getFavNum() {            var count = 0;            var favCookieValue = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_FAV);            if(favCookieValue != null) {                favCookieValue = decodeURIComponent(favCookieValue);                count = favCookieValue.split('|')[FAV_COOKIE_FAV_COUNT_KEY];            }            return count;        }        /**         * Checking super session cookie and calling ajax endpoint if cookie exists         * @returns {boolean}         */        function checkIfUserHasSuperSession() {            // get ss cookie value            var superSessionCookieValue = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_SUPERSESS);            // if there is ss cookie then make ajax (cors) call to check ss cookie and get response on callback            if(superSessionCookieValue !== null){                var xhr = createCORSRequest('GET', 'http://app.dictionary.com/supersession/check/' + superSessionCookieValue);                if (xhr){                    // Define a callback function                    xhr.onload = function(){                        var responseData = xhr.responseText;                        var data = JSON.parse(responseData);                        // process the response.                        // if response is null then do nothing                        if(data == null) {                            // do nothing                        } else {                            // otherwise set the session cookie                            cookiesManager.setCookie("sess", data['sessionCookie']);                            // change header appropriately                            changeBodyClassNameForUser();                        }                    };                    // Send request                    xhr.send();                }                return true;            } else {                return false;            }        }        /**         * A method to create cors request         * @param method         * @param url         * @returns {XMLHttpRequest}         */        function createCORSRequest(method, url) {            var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();            if ("withCredentials" in xhr) {                // Check if the XMLHttpRequest object has a "withCredentials" property.                // "withCredentials" only exists on XMLHTTPRequest2 objects.                xhr.open(method, url, true);            } else if (typeof XDomainRequest != "undefined") {                // Otherwise, check if XDomainRequest.                // XDomainRequest only exists in IE, and is IE's way of making CORS requests.                xhr = new XDomainRequest();                xhr.open(method, url);            } else {                // Otherwise, CORS is not supported by the browser.                xhr = null;            }            return xhr;        }        /**         * Checking user status and setting correct body className for user         */        function changeBodyClassNameForUser() {            if(isPremium)                document.body.className+=' premium';            if(isLoggedIn)                document.body.className+=' loggedin';            if(isUnder13)                document.body.className+=' isUnder13';        }        return {            initHead: function() {                isLoggedIn = checkIsUserLoggedIn();                isPremium = checkIfUserIsPremium();                isUnder13 = checkIsUserUnder13();            },            initBody: function(){                // on initialization check user status and change append body class name accordingly                changeBodyClassNameForUser();                // if the user is not logged in then check to see if the user has an ss cookie                if(isLoggedIn !== true) {                    // call function responsible for checking ss cookie and calling ajax endpoint                    isSuperSess = checkIfUserHasSuperSession();                }            },            isLoggedIn : function() {                return isLoggedIn;            },            isPremium : function() {                return isPremium            },            getFavNumber : function() {                if(favNumber === null) {                    favNumber = getFavNum();                }                return favNumber;            },            isUnder13 : function() {                return isUnder13;            },            shouldDisplayAds: function() {                if(displayAds === null) {                    displayAds = !isPremium && !checkIsUserUnder13();                }                return displayAds;            }        }    }();    UserController.initHead();</script><script type="text/javascript">    var _sp_=function(n){function t(e){if(o[e])return o[e].exports;var r=o[e]={i:e,l:!1,exports:{}};return n[e].call(r.exports,r,r.exports,t),r.l=!0,r.exports}var o={};return t.m=n,t.c=o,t.i=function(n){return n},t.d=function(n,o,e){t.o(n,o)||Object.defineProperty(n,o,{configurable:!1,enumerable:!0,get:e})},t.n=function(n){var o=n&&n.__esModule?function(){return n["default"]}:function(){return n};return t.d(o,"a",o),o},t.o=function(n,t){return Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(n,t)},t.p="",t(t.s=2)}([function(n,t){function o(n,t){e&&console[n].apply(console,["[bootstrap]"].concat(Array.prototype.slice.call(t)))}var e(){D||(D=!0,z=h.config=h.config||{},s(),N=z.bootstrap&&z.bootstrap.contentControlCallback||z.content_control_callback,B=z.accountId||z.account_id||z.client_id||window.sp_cid,G=z.beacon&&z.beacon.contentControlEndpoint||z.content_control_beacon_endpoint||v.a,z.debug_level&&"OFF"!==z.debug_level.toString().toUpperCase()||z.debug&&z.debug.level&&"OFF"!==z.debug.level.toString().toUpperCase()?q=!0:window.location.search&&null!=window.location.search.match(/_sp_debug_level=(?!off|OFF)/)&&(q=!0),q&&m.useDefaults({defaultLevel:m.DEBUG}))}function a=document.createElement("script");a.src=n,a.onload=function(){e.onLoad&&e.onLoad()},a.onerror=function(){function t(n){return o.indexOf(n)>-1}var o=(navigator.userAgent||navigator.vendor||window.opera).toLowerCase();t("mobi")||t("ipad")||t("android")||t("iphone")?i(C):t("exabot")?i(k):t("bingbot")||t("bingpreview")?i(U):t("googlebot")||t("adsbot-google")||t("mediapartners-google")?i(I):t("googleweblight")?i(O):window.location.host===w?i(E):window.location.host.indexOf(b)>-1?i(j):t("msie 10")||t("msie 9")||t("msie 8")?i(S):c(n,r,i)},document.head.appendChild(a),document.querySelector('script[src="'+n+'"]')||-1!==window.location.host.indexOf(b)||(g.info("Script not present"),r(x,n))}function c(n,t,e){o.i(f.a)(n,function(o,r,i,a){(o||r?t:e)(a,n+"::"+i)})}function d(n,t,o,e){if(F)return void u(R+"::"+n,o);r(L,n,t,o,e,function(){if(N){if(q){g.error("bootstrap locking",L,n,t,o,e);debugger}setTimeout(function(){N()},250)}})}function u(n,t,o,e){r(y,n,t,o,e)}function s(){h._networkListenerData||(h._networkListenerData=o.i(p.a)())}function l(n,t){e(),g.info("bootstrap called with",n,t),i(a,n,d,u,t)}Object.defineProperty(t,"__esModule",{value:!0});var f=o(4),p=o(5),v=o(3),g=o(0),m=void 0;m=o(0);var w=["w","e","b","c","a","c","h","e",".","g","o","o","g","l","e","u","s","e","r","c","o","n","t","e","n","t",".","c","o","m"].join(""),b=["o","p","t","i","m","i","z","e","l","y","p","r","e","v","i","e","w",".","c","o","m"].join(""),h=window._sp_||{},_=1,y=0,L=1,x="s",C="m",I="g",E="gw",O="gl",S="i",U="b",k="e",R="n",j="o",D=!1,F=!1,q=!1,z=void 0,N=void 0,B=void 0,G=void 0;window.addEventListener("beforeunload",function(){F=!0}),window._sp_=h,h.setupNetworkListeners=s,h.bootstrap=l,window.spBootstrap=l,t["default"]=h},function(n,t,o){o(0);n.exports=o(1)["default"]},function(n,t,o){"use strict";function e(n){return n.join("")}o.d(t,"b",function(){return r}),o.d(t,"a",function(){return i});var    },    get: function(name) {        return this.renderedSpots[name];    },    getSlotKey: function(slot) {        var slotKey;        for (slotKey in googletag.slots) {            if(googletag.slots[slotKey] == slot) {                break;            }        }        return slotKey;    },    adsLoaded: function() {        return this.renderedSpotsCount >= this.spotsCount;    }};adStatus.dispatchLoadedEvent = function () {    if(adStatus.adsLoaded()) {        if (document.createEvent) {            var event = new CustomEvent('gptAdsLoaded');            document.dispatchEvent(event);        } else {            var event = document.createEventObject();            event.eventType = "gptAdsLoaded";            document.fireEvent("ongptAdsLoaded", event);        var node = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];        node.parentNode.insertBefore(adsbygoogle, node);      }    })();  };  DARCI.configureApstagSpot = function(spot) {    if (typeof spot === 'undefined') {      return    }    var output = [];    output.push({      sizes: spot.sizes,      slotID: spot.placement    });    return output;  };  DARCI.loadDeferredAd = function(slot) {    if (typeof slot !== "object" && typeof slot.placement !== "string") {        return    }        adStatus.displayedSpots.push(slot.placement);    googletag.cmd.push(function() {      googletag.slots[slot.placement] = googletag.defineSlot(slot.code, slot.sizes, slot.placement).addService(googletag.pubads());      for (target in slot.targeting) {        if (slot.targeting.hasOwnProperty(target)) {          googletag.slots[slot.placement].setTargeting(target, slot.targeting[target])        }      }      if (typeof(slot.sizeMapping) === 'function') {        googletag.slots[slot.placement].defineSizeMapping(slot.sizeMapping(googletag))      }      googletag.display(slot.placement);    });    if (typeof apstag !== "object") {      return    }    apstag.fetchBids({      slots: DARCI.configureApstagSpot(slot)    }, function() {      googletag.cmd.push(function() {        apstag.setDisplayBids();//        googletag.display(slot.placement);//        googletag.pubads().refresh([slot]);      });    });  };  (function() {    var purl = window.location.href;    var url = '//ads.pubmatic.com/AdServer/js/pwt/103207/307';    var profileVersionId = '';    if (purl.indexOf('pwtv=') > 0) {      var regexp = /pwtv=(.*?)(&|$)/g;      var matches = regexp.exec(purl);      if (matches.length >= 2 && matches[1].length > 0) {        profileVersionId = '/' + matches[1];      }    }    var wtads = document.createElement('script');    wtads.async = true;    wtads.type = 'text/javascript';    wtads.src = url + profileVersionId + '/pwt.js';    var node = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];    node.parentNode.insertBefore(wtads, node);        });      })(pageTarget, ad_config.pageTargeting[pageTarget]);    }  };  /**---------- Set ad slot level targeting for DFP ----------*/  if (typeof ad_config.slots === "object") {    ad_config.slots.forEach(function(slot, index) {      googletag.cmd.push(function() {        googletag.slots[slot.placement] = googletag.defineSlot(slot.code, slot.sizes, slot.placement).addService(googletag.pubads()); data-filter="http://translate.reference.com/?query=%40%40queryText%40%40">translations</li>                                            </ul>                </div>            </form>        </div> data-href="https://www.facebook.com/dictionarycom" data-layout="button_count" data-action="like" data-show-faces="true" data-share="false"></div>            </div>        </li>        <li>            <a class="twitter-follow-button" href="https://twitter.com/dictionarycom" data-show-screen-name="false">Follow @dictionarycom</a>        </li>        <li>            <span class="ig-follow" data-id="17031a6e93" data-handle="igfbdotcom" data-count="true" data-size="medium" data-username="false"></span>        </li>        <li>            <div class="g-follow" data-annotation="bubble" data-height="20" data-href="https://plus.google.com/117428481782081853923" data-rel="publisher"></div>        </li>    </ul>    <p>follow Dictionary.com</p></div></header><script type="text/javascript">    var DARCI = DARCI || {};    DARCI.searchedTerm = typeof DARCI.OQR !== 'undefined' ? DARCI.OQR.getValue() : null;    DARCI.searchedTerm = DARCI.searchedTerm !== null ? DARCI.searchedTerm : 'industry';    document.getElementById('main_search').onsubmit = function(e, url) {        // if url parameter wasn't passed submitFrom() is called with default parameter, which is searchURL        // searchURL is defined and added as a global js option in controller        return submitForm(url || searchURL);    }    prepareSearchBox(document.getElementById('q'));    cookiesManager.setCookie('ReferrerQuery', DARCI.searchedTerm);</script>    <div id="header-lb-container">        <div class="lb-container">            <div id="dcom-serp-lb-728x90">    <script type="text/javascript">        if (typeof UserController !== "undefined" && !UserController.shouldDisplayAds()) {            document.getElementById("dcom-serp-lb-728x90").parentNode.removeChild(document.getElementById(""));        } else {            adStatus.displayedSpots.push("dcom-serp-lb-728x90");            googletag.cmd.push(function () {                googletag.display("dcom-serp-lb-728x90");            });        }    </script></div>        </div>    </div>    <div id="fly-out" class="fly-out fly-out-desktop" style="">        <a href="http://www.dictionary.com/e/s/umwords/?param=DcomSERP-flyout"  style="display:block;" data-linkid="wh99yq" >            <div class="text">                Avoid these words. </div>        <div class="center-well-container"  data-linkid='nn1ov4' data-cts='{"linkId":"nn1ov4","infix":"","domain":"dictionary.com","clkpage":"dic","clkmod":"1clk","clksite":"dict","clkld":0}' data-href='http://www.dictionary.com/browse/'>            <section id="source-luna" data-pm-btn-target=".source-box, .source-meta" class="source-wrapper source-luna is-pm-btn-show pm-btn-spot">            <div class="source-box oneClick-area">            <section class="luna-box">    <header class="main-header oneClick-disabled cts-disabled head-big">    <div  class="waypoint-wrapper header-row header-first-row" data-href="source-luna">                    <h1 class="head-entry"><span class="me" data-syllable="in·dus·try">industry</span></h1>                <div class="audio-wrapper cts-disabled"> <audio> <source src="http://static.sfdict.com/audio/lunawav/I01/I0144600.ogg" type="audio/ogg"> <source src="http://static.sfdict.com/audio/I01/I0144600.mp3" type="audio/mpeg"> </audio> <div class="speaker"></div></div>            <h3 class="head-entry-variants"></h3>            </div>        <div class="header-row header-extras pronounce pronset">    <div>                    <span class="pron spellpron">[<span class="dbox-bold">in</span>-d<span class="dbox-italic">uh</span>-stree] </span>            <span class="pron ipapron">/ˈɪn də stri/ </span>                            <span class="pre-def-data"> </span>            </div>            <div>            <button class="prontoggle pronounce-button pronounce-Spell-button">Spell</button>            <button class="syllable-button syllable-button-off" data-header="1">Syllables</button>        </div>    </div>        <div class="header-row">        <ul class="headword-bar-list">                            <li>                    <a data-navigation-href="source-synonyms">                        Synonyms                    </a>                </li>                            <li>                    <a data-navigation-href="source-example-sentences">                        Examples                    </a>                </li>                            <li>                    <a data-navigation-href="source-word-origin">                        Word Origin                    </a>                </li>                    </ul>    </div></header><div class="deep-link-synonyms">    <a href="http://www.thesaurus.com/browse/industry" data-linkid="oowy0r" >See more synonyms on Thesaurus.com</a></div>    <div class="source-data">        <div class="def-list">                                        <section class="def-pbk ce-spot" data-collapse-expand='{"target": ".def-set", "type": "def"}'>                    <header class="luna-data-header">                        <span class="dbox-pg">noun</span>, <span class="dbox-pg">plural </span><span class="dbox-bold" data-syllable="in·dus·tries ">industries </span><span class="dbox-roman">for 1, 2, 7.</span>                    </header>                                            <div class="def-set">    <span class="def-number">1.</span>    <div class="def-content">        the aggregate of manufacturing or technically productive enterprises in a particular field, often named after its principal product:                 <div class="def-block def-inline-example"><span class="dbox-example">the automobile industry; the steel industry.</span></div>                </div></div>                                            <div class="def-set">    <span class="def-number">2.</span>    <div class="def-content">        any general business activity; commercial enterprise:                 <div class="def-block def-inline-example"><span class="dbox-example">the Italian tourist industry.</span></div>                </div></div>                                            <div class="def-set">    <span class="def-number">3.</span>    <div class="def-content">        trade or manufacture in general:                 <div class="def-block def-inline-example"><span class="dbox-example">the rise of industry in Africa.</span></div>                </div></div>                                            <div class="def-set">    <span class="def-number">4.</span>    <div class="def-content">        the ownership and management of companies, factories, etc.:                 <div class="def-block def-inline-example"><span class="dbox-example">friction between labor and industry.</span></div>                </div></div>                                            <div class="def-set">    <span class="def-number">5.</span>    <div class="def-content">        systematic work or labor.    </div></div>                                            <div class="def-set">    <span class="def-number">6.</span>    <div class="def-content">        energetic, devoted activity at any work or task; diligence:                 <div class="def-block def-inline-example"><span class="dbox-example">Her teacher praised her industry.</span></div>                </div></div>                                            <div class="def-set">    <span class="def-number">7.</span>    <div class="def-content">        the aggregate of work, scholarship, and ancillary activity in a particular field, often named after its principal subject:                 <div class="def-block def-inline-example"><span class="dbox-example">the Mozart industry.</span></div>                </div></div>                                            <div class="def-set">    <span class="def-number">8.</span>    <div class="def-content">        <span class="dbox-italic">Archaeology. </span>an assemblage of artifacts regarded as unmistakably the work of a single prehistoric group.    </div></div>                                    </section>                    </div>        <div class="tail-wrapper">    <div class="tail-box tail-type-origin pm-btn-spot" data-pm-btn-target=".tail-content" >    <div class="tail-header waypoint-wrapper oneClick-disabled" id="source-word-origin">        Origin of <span class="me" data-syllable="in·dus·try">industry</span>        <button class="button-source" type="button">Expand</button>    </div>            <div class="tail-content "         >                     <div class="tail-elements">                <div class="map-origin">    <div class="map-area">            <div class="map-origin-language" style="left: 49.294444444444%;bottom: 62.438888888889%;">            <div class="dot dot-left dot-bottom "></div>            <div class="language-name oneClick-disabled">                            <a class="language-name" href="http://www.dictionary.com/browse/latin">Latin</a>                        </div>        </div>        </div></div>    <div class="timeline oneClick-disabled">        <div class="span" style="left:61.881188118812% ; width:0.70721357850071% ;">                            <span class="date start-date"   >1475-1485</span>                    </div>    </div><span class="dbox-roman">1475-85;</span> earlier <span class="dbox-italic">industrie</span> < <span class="dbox-roman">Latin</span> <span class="dbox-italic">industria,</span> noun use of feminine of <span class="dbox-italic">industrius</span> <a class="dbox-xref dbox-roman" href="http://www.dictionary.com/browse/industrious">industrious</a>            </div>            </div></div>    <div class="tail-box tail-type-relf pm-btn-spot" data-pm-btn-target=".tail-content" >    <div class="tail-header " >        Related forms        <button class="button-source" type="button">Expand</button>    </div>            <div class="tail-content ce-spot"         data-collapse-expand='{"target": ".tail-elements", "type": "supEntry"}'>                             <div class="tail-elements">                        <span class="dbox-bold" data-syllable="in·ter·in·dus·try, ">interindustry, </span><span class="dbox-pg">adjective</span>                    </div>                                    <div class="tail-elements">                        <span class="dbox-bold" data-syllable="min·i-in·dus·try, ">mini-industry, </span><span class="dbox-pg">noun, </span><span class="dbox-pg">plural </span><span class="dbox-bold" data-syllable="min·i-in·dus·tries.">mini-industries.</span>                    </div>                                    <div class="tail-elements">                        <span class="dbox-bold" data-syllable="non·in·dus·try, ">nonindustry, </span><span class="dbox-pg">adjective</span>                    </div>                                    <div class="tail-elements">                        <span class="dbox-bold" data-syllable="pre·in·dus·try, ">preindustry, </span><span class="dbox-pg">noun, </span><span class="dbox-pg">adjective</span>                    </div>                                    <div class="tail-elements">                        <span class="dbox-bold" data-syllable="pro·in·dus·try, ">proindustry, </span><span class="dbox-pg">adjective</span>                    </div>                                    <div class="tail-elements">                        <span class="dbox-bold" data-syllable="sub·in·dus·try, ">subindustry, </span><span class="dbox-pg">noun, </span><span class="dbox-pg">plural </span><span class="dbox-bold" data-syllable="sub·in·dus·tries.">subindustries.</span>                    </div>                                    <div class="tail-elements">                        <span class="dbox-bold" data-syllable="su·per·in·dus·try, ">superindustry, </span><span class="dbox-pg">noun, </span><span class="dbox-pg">plural </span><span class="dbox-bold" data-syllable="su·per·in·dus·tries.">superindustries.</span>                    </div>                            </div></div>    <div class="tail-box tail-type-synonyms pm-btn-spot" data-pm-btn-target=".tail-content" >    <div class="tail-header waypoint-wrapper" id="source-synonyms">        Synonyms        <button class="button-source" type="button">Expand</button>    </div>    <div class="deep-link-synonyms">    <a href="http://www.thesaurus.com/browse/industry" data-linkid="oowy0r" >See more synonyms on Thesaurus.com</a></div>        <div class="tail-content ce-spot"         data-collapse-expand='{"target": ".tail-elements", "type": "supText"}'>                     <div class="tail-elements">                <span class="dbox-bold">6. </span>application, effort, assiduity, industriousness.            </div>            </div></div>    </div>    </div></section>        </div>            <div data-term="industry"               data-source="luna">Cite This Source</a>        </div>    </section><section id="source-example-sentences" class="source-wrapper source-example-sentences <div class="source-box oneClick-area" data-cts='{"linkId":"k4otco","infix":"","domain":"dictionary.com","clkpage":"dic","clkmod":"1clkesp","clksite":"dict","clkld":0}' data-href='http://www.dictionary.com/browse/' data-imp="k4otco">                            <div class="source-subtitle oneClick-disabled">Contemporary Examples</div>                        <ul>                                    <li>                        <p class="partner-example-text">                            In 2015 I am looking forward to working with more people in the <em>industry</em> and doing crazier and crazier scenes!                        </p>                        <div class="partner-example-credentials"  data-linkid='fboxke'>                            <a class="partner-example-logo" href="http://www.thedailybeast.com?source=dictionary" target="_blank" rel="nofollow"></a>                            <span>                                <a Year in Porn: Drone Erotica, Belle Knox, and Wild Sex</a>                            </span>                            <span>                                <a <li>                        <p class="partner-example-text">                            <em>industry</em> experts claim an increase in awareness amongst men when it comes to styles, design, and price regarding their underwear.                        </p>                        <div class="partner-example-credentials"  data-linkid='fboxke'>                            <a class="partner-example-logo" 50 Cent Bulge? data-href='http://www.dictionary.com/browse/' data-imp="ixxth0">                            <div class="source-subtitle oneClick-disabled">Historical Examples</div>                        <ul>                                    <li>                        <p class="partner-example-text">                            The world beholds the peaceful triumphs of the <em>industry</em> of our emigrants. href="http://www.gutenberg.org/files/925/925-h/925-h.htm" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">United States Presidents' Inaugural Speeches</a>                        </span>                        <span     <div class="partner-example-credentials"  data-linkid='sl8bq9'>                        <span>                            <a href="http://www.gutenberg.org/files/925/925-h/925-h.htm"                 We do not dread, rather do we welcome, their progress in education and <em>industry</em>.                        </p>                        <div class="partner-example-credentials"  data-linkid='sl8bq9'>                        <span>                            <a href="http://www.gutenberg.org/files/925/925-h/925-h.htm" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">United States Presidents' Inaugural Speeches</a>                        </span>                        <span class="oneClick-disabled">                            Various                        </span>                        </div>                    </li>                                    <li>                        <p class="partner-example-text">                            We have made enormous strides in science and <em>industry</em> and agriculture.                        </p>                        <div class="partner-example-credentials"  data-linkid='sl8bq9'>                        <span>                            <a href="http://www.gutenberg.org/files/925/925-h/925-h.htm" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">United States Presidents' Inaugural Speeches</a>                        </span>                        <span class="oneClick-disabled">                            Various                        </span>                        </div>                    </li>                                    <li>                        <p class="partner-example-text">                            In Mr. Chamberlain they had a popular champion of great ability and <em>industry</em>.                        </p>                        <div class="partner-example-credentials"  data-linkid='sl8bq9'>                        <span>                            <a href="http://www.gutenberg.org/files/9900/9900-h/9900-h.htm" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">The Grand Old Man</a>                        </span>                        <span class="oneClick-disabled">                            Richard B. Cook                        </span>                        </div>                    </li>                            </ul>        </div>    </section><section id="source-ced2" data-pm-btn-target=".source-box, .source-meta" class="source-wrapper source-ced2 is-pm-btn-show pm-btn-spot">            <div class="source-title">            British Dictionary definitions for <span class="u-headword">industry</span>            <button class="button-source" type="button">Expand</button>        </div>            <div class="source-box oneClick-area">            <header class="main-header oneClick-disabled cts-disabled head-big">    <div class="header-row header-first-row">                    <h2 class="head-entry"><span class="me">industry</span></h2>                    </div>                <div class="header-row header-middle-row">            <div class="pronounce">                <span class="pronset">                    <span class="pron ipapron" >/<span class="dbox-pron">ˈɪndəstrɪ</span>/ </span>                </span>            </div>        </div>    </header><div class="source-data ce-spot"                        data-collapse-expand='{"target": ".def-coll", "type": "collins"}'>    <div class="def-coll">        <div class="def-list">            <div class="def-pbk">            <span class="dbox-pg">noun </span>(<span class="dbox-bold">pl</span>) <span class="dbox-bold">-tries</span>                            <div class="def-set">                    <span class="def-number">1.</span>                    <div class="def-content">                        organized economic activity concerned with manufacture, extraction and processing of raw materials, or construction                    </div>                </div>                                            <div class="def-set">                    <span class="def-number">2.</span>                    <div class="def-content">                        a branch of commercial enterprise concerned with the output of a specified product or service: <span class="dbox-ex">the steel industry</span>                    </div>                </div>                                            <div class="def-set">                    <span class="def-number">3.</span>                    <div class="def-content">                                                    <ol class="def-sub-list">                                                                    <li>industrial ownership and management interests collectively, as contrasted with labour interests</li>                                                                    <li>manufacturing enterprise collectively, as opposed to agriculture</li>                                                            </ol>                                                                        </div>                </div>                                            <div class="def-set">                    <span class="def-number">4.</span>                    <div class="def-content">                        diligence; assiduity                    </div>                </div>                                    </div>    </div>        <div class="tail-wrapper">            <div class="tail-box tail-type-origin">                            <div class="tail-header">                    Word Origin                </div>                        <div class="tail-content">                                    <div class="tail-elements">                        C15: from Latin <span class="dbox-italic">industria</span> diligence, from <span class="dbox-italic">industrius</span> active, of uncertain origin                    </div>                            </div>        </div>    </div>    </div></div>        </div>            <div class="source-meta">            Collins English Dictionary - Complete & Unabridged 2012 Digital Edition<br /> © William Collins Sons & Co. Ltd. 1979, 1986 © HarperCollins<br />Publishers 1998, 2000, 2003, 2005, 2006, 2007, 2009, 2012<br/>            <a href="#" class="source-cite" rel="nofollow" data-term="industry"               data-source="ced2">Cite This Source</a>        </div>    </section><section id="source-etymon2" data-pm-btn-target=".source-box, .source-meta" class="source-wrapper source-etymon2 is-pm-btn-show pm-btn-spot">            <div class="source-title">            Word Origin and History for <span class="u-headword">industry</span>            <button class="button-source" type="button">Expand</button>        </div>            <div class="source-box oneClick-area">            <div class="source-data">        <div class="def-list">                    <span class="dbox-italic">n.</span>                        <section class="def-pbk">                                    <div class="def-set">                            <p>late 15c., "cleverness, skill," from Old French <span class="dbox-italic">industrie</span> "activity; aptitude" (14c.) or directly from Latin <span class="dbox-italic">industria</span> "diligence, activity, zeal," fem. of <span class="dbox-italic">industrius</span> "industrious, diligent," used as a noun, from early Latin <span class="dbox-italic">indostruus</span> "diligent," from <span class="dbox-italic">indu</span> "in, within" + stem of <span class="dbox-italic">struere</span> "to build" (see <a class="dbox-xref" href="/browse/structure">structure</a> (n.)). Sense of "diligence, effort" is from 1530s; meaning "trade or manufacture" first recorded 1560s; that of "systematic work" is 1610s.</p>                    </div>                            </section>            </div></div>        </div>            <div class="source-meta">            Online Etymology Dictionary, © 2010 Douglas Harper<br/>            <a href="#" class="source-cite" rel="nofollow" data-term="industry"               data-source="etymon2">Cite This Source</a>        </div>    </section>                            <div class="hidden-xs">                    <div class="slideshows short-serp-slideshow"         data-imp="nqdc8q" data-linkid='nqdc8q' >    <h3>Discover our greatest slideshows</h3>    <ul class="carousel">                        <li class="slide"> can ruin your...</a>                        </h3>                    </div>                </li>                <li class="slide">                    <a                  <div class="right-rail-middle-box"><div id="dcom-serp-a-mid-300x250">    <script type="text/javascript">        if (typeof UserController !== "undefined" && type="text/javascript" src="http://app.dictionary.com/js/advertisement.js"></script><script>    if (typeof window.canRunAds === 'undefined') {        var img = new Image(),        url = 'http://track.dictionary.com/main.gif?ev=a&ms=%40%40MSEG%40%40&rf=%40%40REFERRER%40%40&cb=%40%40CACHEBUSTER%40%40&pn=dic&st=dict&ab=&dc=desktop';        url = url.replace('%40%40REFERRER%40%40', encodeURIComponent(document.referrer))            .replace('%40%40CACHEBUSTER%40%40', Math.floor((Math.random() * 899999999) + 100000000))            .replace('%40%40MSEG%40%40', (cookiesManager.getCookieValue('mseg') || ''));        img.src = url;    }</script><script>    /*     Below immediately function provide support for browsers, which do not support modern standards (https://dom.spec.whatwg.org/)     partially taken from: plainjs.com    */    (function (e) {        'use strict';        e.matches = e.matches ||            e.matchesSelector ||            e.webkitMatchesSelector ||            e.msMatchesSelector ||            function (selector) {                var node = this, nodes = (node.parentNode || node.document).querySelectorAll(selector), i = -1;                while (nodes[++i] && nodes[i] != node);                return !!nodes[i];            };        e.closest = e.closest || function (css) {                var node = this;                while (node) {                    if (node.matches(css)) return node;                    else node = node.parentElement;                }                return null;            };        e.hasClass = e.hasClass || function (className) {                var node = this;                return node.classList ? node.classList.contains(className) : new RegExp('\\b' + className + '\\b').test(node.className);            };        e.addClass = e.addClass || function (className) {                var node = this;                if (node.classList) node.classList.add(className);                else if (!node.hasClass(node, className)) node.className += ' ' + className;            };        e.removeClass = e.removeClass || function(className) {                var node = this;                if (node.classList) node.classList.remove(className);                else node.className = node.className.replace(new RegExp('\\b' + className + '\\b', 'g'), '');            };        e.on = e.on || function (event, selector, callback, context) {                var el = context || document;                el.addEventListener(event, function (e) {                    var found, el = e.target || e.srcElement;                    while (el && el.matches && el !== context && !(found = el.matches(selector))) el = el.parentElement;                    if (found) callback.call(this, el, e);                });            };    }(Element.prototype));</script><!-- Begin Quantcast Tag, part 2 --><script type="text/javascript">if (typeof UserController === "undefined" || !UserController.isUnder13()) {    _qevents.push({qacct: "p-51zXP5Cc9sxvQ"});}</script><noscript><div style="display: none;"><img src="//pixel.quantserve.com/pixel/p-51zXP5Cc9sxvQ.gif" height="1" width="1" alt="Quantcast"/></div></noscript><!-- End Quantcast Tag, part 2 --><script>    /*global $, pageName, window */    var BCT = (function () {        'use strict';        var webTrackURL = 'http://track.dictionary.com/main.gif?ev=c&cl=%40%40LINKIDS%40%40&ci=%40%40ITEM%40%40&co=%40%40ORDINAL%40%40&ms=%40%40MSEG%40%40&ds=%40%40DESTINATION%40%40&qr=%25%25QUERY%25%25&rf=%40%40REFERRER%40%40&cb=%40%40CACHEBUSTER%40%40&pn=%40%40PAGENAME%40%40&st=dict&ab=&dc=desktop',            query, originalQuery;                    originalQuery = typeof DARCI.OQR !== 'undefined' ? DARCI.OQR.getValue() : null;            query =  originalQuery !== null ? originalQuery : "industry";            webTrackURL = webTrackURL.replace('%25%25QUERY%25%25', query);                /**         * Returns data, which will be logged.         *         * NOTE:         * Possible, that empty array will be returned.         */        function getData(target) {            var ctsData,                closestLinkIDElement,                data = {};            ctsData = JSON.parse(target.getAttribute('data-cts'));            if (ctsData !== null) {                data.linkId = ctsData.linkId;                data.item = "";                data.ordinal = ctsData.ordinal;            } else {                closestLinkIDElement = target.closest('[data-linkid]');                if (null !== closestLinkIDElement && null === target.closest('[data-type]')) {                    data.linkId = closestLinkIDElement.getAttribute('data-linkid');                    data.item = getItem(target);                    data.ordinal = getOrdinal(target, closestLinkIDElement);                }            }            return data;        }        function getItem(target) {            var closestWithItem = target.closest('[data-item]'),                item = '';            if (null !== closestWithItem) {                item = target.textContent.trim();            }            return item;        }        function getOrdinal(target, dataItem) {            var closestWithOrdinal,                value = '';            if (dataItem !== target) { // if element with linkid is not the anchor itself we are going deeper                closestWithOrdinal = target.closest('[data-ordinal]');                if (null !== closestWithOrdinal) {                    var links = closestWithOrdinal.querySelectorAll("a"),                        len = links.length;                    for (var i = 0; i < len; i++) {                        if (target === links[i]) {                            value = i + 1;                        }                    }                }            }            return value;        }        /**         * Returns data, which are generated always in the same way         */        function getCommonData(destination) {            var data = {};            data.cacheBuster = Math.floor((Math.random() * 899999999) + 100000000);            data.pageName = pageName;            data.mseg = getMsegValue();            data.destination = encodeURIComponent(destination);            return data;        }        /**         * Redirects user to destination         */        function redirectToDest(location) {            window.location = location;        }        /**         * Returns value of cookie based on name         */        function getCookieByName(name) {            var value = null,                cookies = document.cookie,                searchedCookie = cookies.indexOf(" " + name + "=");            // it's worth to check, if cookie is not first cookie            if (searchedCookie === -1) {                var checkFirstCookie = cookies.indexOf(name + "=");                searchedCookie = checkFirstCookie === 0 ? 0 : -1;            }            if (searchedCookie > -1) {                var startPositionOfValue = cookies.indexOf("=", searchedCookie) + 1,                    endPositionOfValue = cookies.indexOf(";", searchedCookie);                if (endPositionOfValue === -1) {                    endPositionOfValue = searchedCookie.length;                }                value = cookies.substring(startPositionOfValue,endPositionOfValue);            }            return value;        }        /**         * Returns value of mseg cookie         */        function getMsegValue() {            var msegVal;            if (typeof cookiesManager !== "undefined") {                msegVal = cookiesManager.getCookieValue("mseg");            } else {                msegVal = getCookieByName("mseg");            }            return msegVal || "";        }        /**         * Renders WebTrack URL         */        function renderWebTrackURL(data, destination) {            var commonData = getCommonData(destination);            return webTrackURL.replace('%40%40REFERRER%40%40', encodeURIComponent(document.referrer))                .replace('%40%40LINKIDS%40%40', data.linkId || "")                .replace('%40%40ITEM%40%40', encodeURIComponent(data.item) || "")                .replace('%40%40ORDINAL%40%40', data.ordinal || "")                .replace('%40%40CACHEBUSTER%40%40', commonData.cacheBuster || "")                .replace('%40%40PAGENAME%40%40', commonData.pageName || "")                .replace('%40%40MSEG%40%40', commonData.mseg || "")                .replace('%40%40DESTINATION%40%40', commonData.destination || "");        }        function logAndRedirect(data, destination) {            var logURL = renderWebTrackURL(data, destination),                image = new Image(),                timeout;            timeout = setTimeout(                function(){                    redirectToDest(destination);                },                2000            );            image.onload = image.onerror = function () {                clearTimeout(timeout);                redirectToDest(destination);            };            image.src = logURL;            return false;        }        /**         * Registers click event handler to body so it receives every click on anchor.         */        function attachHandler() {            var bodyTag = document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0];            bodyTag.on("click", 'a', function (elem, event) {                var target = event.target,                    enabled = target.closest('.cts-enabled'),                    disabled = target.closest('.cts-disabled'),                    destination = elem.getAttribute('href'),                    dataToLog;                if (typeof destination === "undefined") {                    return true;                }                if (target.hasClass('cts-clicked')) {                    return false;                }                //ACE-1060                if (disabled !== null && (enabled === null || disabled.childNodes.length < enabled.childNodes.length)) { return true }                dataToLog = getData(target);                // if object has no id it means that link shouldn't be tracked - follow the link                if (typeof dataToLog.linkId === "undefined") {                    return true;                }                event.preventDefault();                // mark this link as already clicked                target.addClass('cts-clicked');                return logAndRedirect(dataToLog, destination);            });        }        return {            attachHandler: attachHandler,            /**             * ::redirect() method is method used by oneClick module             */            redirect: function (ctsData, destinationHref, item) {                var data = {};                data.linkId = ctsData.linkId || ctsData.linkid;                data.item = item;                data.ordinal = '';                return logAndRedirect(data, destinationHref);            }        };    }());    /** Do the initial attachment to <body> links */    BCT.attachHandler();</script><script type="text/javascript" src="http://static.sfdict.com/app/js/require-37278.js"></script><script type="text/javascript">    requirejs.config({    });    require(["page\/serp\/main"])</script><script>    (function (factory) {        if (typeof require === 'function') {            require(['jquery'], factory);        } else {            factory($);        }    }(function($) {        var impressionLinkIds = {};        $('[data-imp]').each(function () {            if ($(this).is(':visible')) {                var imp = $(this).data('imp').toString().split('|', 2);                if (impressionLinkIds[imp[0]] === undefined) {                    impressionLinkIds[imp[0]] = 0;                }                if (imp[1] !== undefined) {                    impressionLinkIds[imp[0]] += parseInt(imp[1]);                } else {                    impressionLinkIds[imp[0]] += 1;                }            }        });        var lkValue = '';        for (var linkId in impressionLinkIds) {            lkValue += linkId + (impressionLinkIds[linkId] > 1 ? '|' + impressionLinkIds[linkId] : '') + ','        }        if (lkValue.slice(-1) === ',') {            lkValue = lkValue.slice(0, -1);        }        if (lkValue != '') {            var ms = (typeof ms === 'undefined') ? cookiesManager.getCookieValue('mseg') || "" : ms;            new Image().src = "http://track.dictionary.com/main.gif?ev=i&pn=dic&st=dict&ab=&dc=desktop&lk=" + lkValue + "&ms=" + ms + "&rf=" + encodeURIComponent(document.referrer) + "&cb=" + Math.floor((Math.random()*899999999)+100000000);        }    }));</script>    </body>    </html>
